patthana16.34:1.1_0: Ācayagāmiṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naācayagāmī nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā terasa,
patthana16.34:1.1_1: ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate terasa.
patthana16.34:2.1_0: Ācayagāmiṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naapacayagāmī nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.34:2.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
